code: import React from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Header from'./Header';import{useGroceryList}from'./GroceryListContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function RecipePage(_ref){let{recipes}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const recipe=recipes[id];const{addIngredient}=useGroceryList();const handleAddToGroceryList=ingredient=>{addIngredient(ingredient);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:"McDonald's Recipe",src:"/mcdicon.png"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/"+recipe.image,alt:recipe.title,className:"recipe-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"recipe-title",children:recipe.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:recipe.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Ingredients"}),recipe.ingredients.map((ingredient,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"recipe-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-btn",onClick:()=>handleAddToGroceryList(ingredient),children:"+"}),ingredient]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Instructions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ol",{children:recipe.instructions.map((instruction,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:instruction},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"backhome-btn",children:"Back Home"})})]})]})]});}
